## Examples with common datasets

### GG1D simulated data

```{r message=FALSE}
# Read data
path_gg1d <- system.file("testdata/testinput.csv", package = "gg1d")
df <- read.csv(path_gg1d, header = TRUE, na.strings = "")

# Plot data, sort by Glasses
gg1d(
  df, 
  col_id = "ID", 
  col_sort = "Glasses", 
  legend_nrow = 2
)
```


### Iris

```{r message=FALSE}
gg1d(iris)
```
